item.title: Artificial Intelligence and Education
item.description: Introduction Currently, technology is ubiquitous, including in the field of education, where it has been shown to be very important in achieving student learning outcomes. Education is no longer just a text instruction or a memorizing requirement for a student. The teaching process, both inside and outside the classroom, has become a work with measurable goals and outcomes. Over time, educational strategies have been identified as part of the inputs and outcomes of the learning process.
